metadata.title: CVE-2023-28155 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** The Request package through 2.88.1 forNode.js allows a bypass of SSRF mitigations via an attacker-controllerserver that does a cross-protocol redirect (HTTP to HTTPS, or HTTPS toHTTP). NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longersupported by the maintainer.

criterions.comment: node-request: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
